item.title: By: Guild divas: There can only be one | Warcraft-News.com
item.dc:creator: Guild divas: There can only be one | Warcraft-News.com
item.description: [...] seen that phenomenon a few times in my WoW history, and it’s recently been popularized on AFK Gamer. A small minority of female WoW players do not play well with others. They generally tend to [...]

item.title: By: Balerion
item.dc:creator: Balerion
item.description: I saw this in EQ a LOT, but oddly enough never in WoW. Either way, it's a major annoyance to the people who log in to kill dragons, progress to bigger dragons, and shoot the breeze on vent.
item.content:encoded: I saw this in EQ a LOT, but oddly enough never in WoW. Either way, it’s a major annoyance to the people who log in to kill dragons, progress to bigger dragons, and shoot the breeze on vent.

item.title: By: Girl Meets WoW
item.dc:creator: Girl Meets WoW
item.description: And that, if you ask me, is one of the major reasons why I'd never want to be in a guild with an all-male officer corp. Your average gamer girl despises this sort of twisted attention-seeking type even more than the guys. I've got a female GL, and 3 of our 13 officers are female. We've had our share of drama, but it's never this particular flavor.
item.content:encoded: And that, if you ask me, is one of the major reasons why I’d never want to be in a guild with an all-male officer corp. Your average gamer girl despises this sort of twisted attention-seeking type even more than the guys. I’ve got a female GL, and 3 of our 13 officers are female. We’ve had our share of drama, but it’s never this particular flavor.

item.title: By: L'Emmerdeur
item.dc:creator: L'Emmerdeur
item.description: Now I know where New York escort agencies get their endless supply of dumb, pretty fodder - girls like this inevitably grow up and get thrown out by their long-suffering parents.
item.content:encoded: Now I know where New York escort agencies get their endless supply of dumb, pretty fodder – girls like this inevitably grow up and get thrown out by their long-suffering parents.
